casebody.data:
No. 10-5874. Carlos Rodriguez, Petitioner v. Director of Special Housing and Inmate Disciplinary Programs. 562 U.S. 940, 131 S. Ct. 354,

178 L. Ed. 2d 229,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7162. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Division, Supreme Court of New York, Third Judicial Department, denied.

Same case below, 71 App. Div. 3d 1346, 897 N.Y.S.2d 311.
